entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022
